name: Shinjuku Library
description: A peaceful public library in Shinjuku with dedicated quiet zones and strong Wi-Fi.

name: Cafe de L'Ambre
description: Classic coffeehouse with rich brews and a quiet, relaxed atmosphere ideal for reading or writing.

name: New York Public Library - Main Branch
description: Iconic library with beautiful architecture, ample seating, and a dedicated reading room.

name: Think Coffee - Mercer St
description: Popular NYU-adjacent café with plenty of plug-in space and a study-friendly vibe.

name: Alfred Coffee
description: Trendy LA café known for strong coffee and style — quieter during mid-day hours.

name: Santa Monica Public Library
address: 601 Santa Monica Blvd, Santa Monica, CA 90401
description: Modern library near the beach with a peaceful atmosphere, outlets at every desk, and plenty of parking.
